alert.note: Alert for Castle Country (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 10:58PM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, locally up to 8 inches from Helper to near Woodside. * WHERE...Castle Country. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, especially Monday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
